    Penalised Illness-death model algorithm with M-splines baseline risk

    idm.penalty.splines.Rd

    Penalised Illness-death model algorithm with M-splines baseline risk

    idm.penalty.splines(
  b,
  fix0,
  size_V,
  size_spline,
  clustertype,
  epsa,
  epsb,
  epsd,
  eps.eigen,
  nproc,
  maxiter,
  maxiter.pena,
  knots01,
  knots02,
  knots12,
  ctime,
  N,
  nknots01,
  nknots02,
  nknots12,
  ve01,
  ve02,
  ve12,
  dimnva01,
  dimnva02,
  dimnva12,
  nvat01,
  nvat02,
  nvat12,
  t0,
  t1,
  t2,
  t3,
  troncature,
  gausspoint,
  nlambda01,
  lambda01,
  nlambda02,
  lambda02,
  nlambda12,
  lambda12,
  alpha,
  penalty.factor,
  penalty,
  analytics
)

    Arguments

    b

    parameters not fixed

    fix0

    indicators of fixed and unfixed parameters

    size_V

    number of parameters

    size_spline

    number of splines parameters

    clustertype

    in which cluster to work

    epsa

    control convergence parameter for beta

    epsb

    control convergence parameter for loglik

    epsd

    control convergence for distance to minimum rdm

    eps.eigen

    the power of convergence for eigen values of covariance matrix only

    nproc

    number of cluster

    maxiter

    Maximum number of iterations. The default is 200.

    maxiter.pena

    Maximum number of iterations for penalised coefficients

    knots01

    knots of transition 0 –> 1

    knots02

    knots of transition 0 –> 2

    knots12

    knots of transition 1 –> 2

    ctime

    classification of subject according to their observations

    N

    number of subjects

    nknots01

    number of knots for transition 0 –>1

    nknots02

    number of knots for transition 0 –>2

    nknots12

    number of knots for transition 1 –>2

    ve01

    variables for transition 0 –>1

    ve02

    variables for transition 0 –>2

    ve12

    variables for transition 1 –>2

    dimnva01

    number of variables for transition 0 –>1

    dimnva02

    number of variables for transition 0 –>2

    dimnva12

    number of variables for transition 1 –>2

    nvat01

    number of variables for transition 0 –>1

    nvat02

    number of variables for transition 0 –>2

    nvat12

    number of variables for transition 1 –>2

    t0

    time entry

    t1

    time L

    t2

    time R

    t3

    time of event/out

    troncature

    indicator if troncature or not

    gausspoint

    number of points in gauss quadrature

    nlambda01

    number of Lambda on transition 0 –> 1

    lambda01

    Lambda on transition 0 –> 1

    nlambda02

    number of Lambda on transition 0 –> 2

    lambda02

    Lambda on transition 0 –> 2

    nlambda12

    number of Lambda on transition 1 –> 2

    lambda12

    Lambda on transition 1 –> 2

    alpha

    alpha on all transitions

    penalty.factor

    which variable should be penalised

    penalty

    which penalty to consider

    analytics

    TRUE if analytical hessian for M-spline otherwise FALSE - diff finite (default)

    Author

    R: Ariane Bercu <ariane.bercu@u-bordeaux.fr>

    Contents

    Developed by Ariane Bercu.
